mapper.insert: insert into payment(member_id, mission_id, payment_code, payment_amount, status, payment_date) values (#{memberId}, #{missionId}, #{paymentCode}, #{paymentAmount}, #{status}, #{paymentDate})

insert into payment_history(payment_id, member_id, mission_id, payment_code, payment_amount, payment_date, reason, create_date) values (#{paymentId}, #{memberId}, #{missionId}, #{paymentCode}, #{paymentAmount}, #{paymentDate}, #{reason}, #{createdDate})
